text: == Events == * April 22 – Pope Gregory VII (Cardinal Hildebrand) succeeds Pope Alexander II as the 155th pope. * Emperor Shirakawa ascends the throne of Japan * Rabbi Yitchaki Alfassi finishes writing the Rif, an important work of Jewish law. * John IX bar Shushan ends term as Syrian Patriarch of Antioch * Beginning of Sviatoslav II's reign as ruler of Kievan Rus * Seljuk Turks conquer Ankara == Births == * David the Builder, King of Georgia * Margrave Leopold III of Austria == Deaths == * April 21 – Pope Alexander II * June 15 – Emperor Go-Sanjō of Japan (b. 1034) * Zhou Dunyi – Neo-Confucian philosopher in Song Dynasty China Category:1073
